description: Root instructions and mission for the repository. Read by entities on first encounter to understand what this is, how to work, and where to find key resources.

required: What This Is — identity and pillars
Mission — what this iteration aims to achieve
How We Work — working principles and entity roles
optional: Key Documents — references to principles, positioning, origins
Prior Art — references to previous iterations

content: Natural language. Sets tone and direction. Should be self-sufficient for orientation — an entity reading only this file understands the mission and way of working.
